TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ICodeCompiler

summary.span: 定義一個介面，用於叫用原始程式碼或使用特定編譯器之 CodeDOM 樹狀結構的編譯。

span.span: Defines an interface for invoking compilation of source code or a CodeDOM tree using a specific compiler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，程式碼提供者所組成的實作， ， ，和。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, code providers consist of implementations of , , , and . 在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]、 ， ，和方法已過時，以及的方法和直接用於類別。In the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], the , , and methods are obsolete, and the methods of and are directly available in the class. 您應該在您的程式碼提供者實作中覆寫這些方法，並呼叫基底的方法。You should override those methods in your code provider implementation and not call the base methods. 可以實作介面，讓特定編譯器可讓開發人員以程式設計的方式編譯的程式碼文件物件模型 (CodeDOM) 的編譯單位，包含原始碼的字串中的組件或原始程式碼檔。The interface can be implemented for a specific compiler to enable developers to programmatically compile assemblies from Code Document Object Model (CodeDOM) compile units, strings containing source code, or source code files. 介面可讓您叫用編譯與執行階段及存取相關資訊編譯之後進行編譯，包括結果程式碼，以及任何錯誤或警告，編譯器會傳回在指定的參數。The interface provides the capability to invoke compilation with specified parameters at runtime and access information related to compilation after compilation occurs, including the result code, and any errors or warnings the compiler returns. 每個編譯方法接受物件，表示設定編譯器，並傳回物件，表示編譯的結果。Each compile method accepts a object that indicates settings for the compiler, and returns a object that indicates the results of the compilation. 編譯器的開發人員應該提供支援動態編譯此介面的實作。Compiler developers should provide an implementation of this interface to support dynamic compilation. 實作者也應該考慮實作這個介面提供以程式設計方式編譯功能的語言，它們提供 CodeDom 支援的。 implementers should also consider implementing this interface to provide programmatic compilation capability for the language that they are providing CodeDom support for.

permission.span: 針對完全信任立即呼叫者。

span.span: for full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 這個介面不能由部分信任程式碼。

span.span: This interface cannot be used by partially trusted code.

permission.span: 針對繼承者完全信任。

span.span: for full trust for inheritors.

permission.span: 實作這個介面的類別無法被繼承，部分信任程式碼。

span.span: Classes that implement this interface cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.

param.span: 物件，表示編譯的設定值。

span.span: A object that indicates the settings for compilation.
A that indicates the code to compile.

summary.span: 使用指定的編譯器設定，在指定的 所包含的 樹狀結構中，編譯一個組件。

span.span: Compiles an assembly from the tree contained in the specified , using the specified compiler settings.
A object that indicates the results of compilation.
